activities: This certification covers personal data transferred from the EU regarding EU employees, customers, suppliers and vendors for various purposes including employee benefits, human resource management, sales & marketing activities, and supply chain management not processed under separate derogation including but not limited to consent, contract, etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Medical Equipment - (MED)Dental Equipment - (DNT)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
